features.label: Daily
features.headline: Daily Personalized Horoscope
features.body: Each reading is built from your natal chart and live transits so you get concrete, relevant guidance every day.

features.label: Natal
features.headline: Birth Chart Analysis
features.body: Orbit combines signs, houses, and aspects into one readable narrative so you can understand your core patterns and blind spots.
features.visual_body: No isolated placement blurbs. Your chart is interpreted as one system with meaningful connections.

features.label: Synastry
features.headline: Compatibility Matching
features.body: Compare two charts across emotional flow, communication style, chemistry, long-term stability, and growth dynamics.
features.visual_body: Get a dimensional read on where the connection is smooth, where it is tense, and what to do about it.

features.label: Conversation
features.headline: The Chatbot Astrologer
features.body: Ask direct questions and get chart-grounded responses instantly. Orbit remembers your context and answers with practical detail.
features.visual_body: Career move, relationship tension, timing confusion - ask one question and get an actionable next step.

features.label: Long-Range
features.headline: Yearly Forecast
features.body: See the year as a timeline of themes so you know when to push, when to pause, and where your focus will matter most.
features.visual_body: Track major activation periods and use them intentionally instead of reacting late.

messages.text: I got offered a new job but something feels off. Should I take it?
Your 10th house ruler is being squared by transiting Saturn, which can create productive doubt around career moves. Saturn is asking for better terms, not automatic rejection.
It seems rigid and I am worried I will lose momentum.
That tracks your chart pattern. Structure helps you, but monotony drains you. Counter-offer for flexibility first. If they cannot move, keep looking while this transit tightens your standards.
